item.title: Will Cell Phones Replace Laptop Computers?
item.description:
Laptops have taken over as the primary mobile work tool, but their days may be numbered. They are bulky, heavy, and require constant charging. A simple legal pad is starting to look more appealing in comparison. The search is on for a mobile device that offers the right balance of power and portability. Could the answer be cell phones? The idea of an all-in-one cell phone is appealing because most people carry one anyway...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/will-cell-phones-replace-laptop-computers/

item.title: Running With Your Computer
item.description:
You were probably told not to run with scissors as a kid, and as an adult, you’ve likely realized that running with a computer isn’t the best idea either. Dropping a desktop computer, especially an old bulky one, would be a disaster. Even dropping a laptop while rushing down a hallway can lead to a hefty repair bill. This isn’t about running with your computer, though. It’s about exercising while using it...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/running-with-your-computer/
